name: Ari-Ani
description: A WhatsApp Bot With Rich NSFW Features based on chitoge.

SESSION_ID.description: A string for the session to get qr code (dont forget it)

MODS.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be admin for the bot (should be in international format without + and multiple numbers must be separated by a comma "," [Ex: 923265825610,923087880256,263788671478])

MONGODB.description: A secret String for Mongodb Connection.

PACKNAME.description: A secret String for Sticker packname.

AUTHOR.description: A secret String for Sticker author.
